tasks.label: Restart Photographer API
tasks.command: bash -c 'if [ -f /tmp/uvicorn.pid ]; then kill $(cat /tmp/uvicorn.pid) 2>/dev/null; fi; sleep 1; setsid uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 > /tmp/uvicorn.log 2>&1 & echo $! > /tmp/uvicorn.pid && echo "‚úÖ API restarted (PID: $(cat /tmp/uvicorn.pid))"'

tasks.label: Start Photographer API
tasks.command: bash -c 'setsid uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 > /tmp/uvicorn.log 2>&1 & echo $! > /tmp/uvicorn.pid && sleep 2 && if kill -0 $(cat /tmp/uvicorn.pid) 2>/dev/null; then echo "‚úÖ API started (PID: $(cat /tmp/uvicorn.pid))"; else echo "‚ùå Failed"; cat /tmp/uvicorn.log; fi'

tasks.label: Stop Photographer API
tasks.command: if [ -f /tmp/uvicorn.pid ]; then kill $(cat /tmp/uvicorn.pid) 2>/dev/null && echo 'üõë API stopped' || echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  No running API found'; rm -f /tmp/uvicorn.pid; else echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  No PID file found'; fi

tasks.label: Check Photographer API Status
tasks.command: bash -c 'if [ -f /tmp/uvicorn.pid ] && kill -0 $(cat /tmp/uvicorn.pid) 2>/dev/null; then echo "‚úÖ API running (PID: $(cat /tmp/uvicorn.pid))"; curl -s http://localhost:8000/health | python -m json.tool 2>/dev/null || echo "‚ö†Ô∏è  API process exists but not responding"; else echo "‚ùå API not running"; fi'
